string-array.name: v57
string-array.item: Swiftkey: darkened side panels in keyboard for emoji

string-array.name: v56
string-array.item: Pushbullet: fixed background for latest update and removed green color
NovaLauncher: fixed white background in settings for layers(thanks direktiv 4)
MMS: some test fixes for Broken OS
Google: fixed text color below search bar

string-array.name: v55
string-array.item: Launcher3: rethemed for cm and added to layers
Google +: minor changes for text color
MMS: fixed white background for SlimSaber
Dialer: fixed black dialpad for the pitch theme

string-array.name: v54
string-array.item: System: fixed white on white for recent apps
Play Store: reduced shadows for cards (black rating text cannot be fixed)
Instagram: changed green following button to black

string-array.name: v53
string-array.item: System: removed custom statusbar icons for cm (if you\'re on layers, you can remove it from the manager, and if you still want it for cm, use the xda version)
Dialer: added support for Cyanogen OS\'s truecaller
Google Play Store: small updates for android M
New: started theming google package installer for layers

string-array.name: v51
string-array.item: New: themed Google Deskclock for layers (blue is the selected day for alarms, not white)
DocumentsUI: added support for android M
App: updated all dependencies for Android M
New: themed google calendar (test in xda build, far from perfect)
Deskclock: moved cyanogenmod one to xda build to avoid certain issues

string-array.name: v50
string-array.item: Google Keyboard: fixed for layers (supports down to xhdpi)
AOSP Keyboard: fixed for layers (supports down to xhdpi)
New: themed Cyanogen OS Theme Chooser
New: themed spotify for cm and layers
Apex Launcher: fixed for cm and themed for layers
Play Store: made selected drawer item dark
Theme: added fab for cyanogen os\'s theme chooser

string-array.name: v49
string-array.item: Commence support for android M! Changes to framework, systemui, and settings for layers.
Layers, fix volume dialog hiding app foreground issue for M (posted fix in layers community)
New: themed GMD\'s auto hide soft keys; notification text cannot be changed
New: made Francisco Franco\'s soft reboot app a dialog for easier access
New: themed face unlock for layers
New: themed telecom (system app) for layers
*Note that the Android M Preview does not fully support layers, so system bugs are to be expected and currently aren\'t fixable.*

string-array.name: v48
string-array.item: New: custom vector wifi and signal icons for layers and cm
New: themed appmonger for cm and layers
New: themed instagram for cm and layers. INSTAGRAM\'S SETTINGS WILL CRASH IN LAYERS. From how it\'s made it can\'t be fixed for now.
Google +: made notification panel less transparent

string-array.name: v47
string-array.item: Contacts: themed again for layers based on rro commits
New: added pitch black overlays for both contacts and dialer; make sure you apply the original layer along with this one
Tapatalk: added it to the layers list
Settings: themed bitsyko layers drawable and orion icon

string-array.name: v46
string-array.item: Layers Manager: updated for new upcoming beta (themed from source)
New: themed layers showcase for rro (filter dialog and search box cannot be themed yet)
Settings: added slim icon and layers icon for xxhdpi
RRO and CM: added lint.xml to all packages to help reduce force crash
Play Store: fixed black text in rating dialog and other colors
New: themed tapatalk for cm and layers (make sure you use the dark theme!)
Framework: changed notification accent to pitched blue

string-array.name: v45
string-array.item: App: added link card to google + beta community
New: themed hangouts 4.0 in the cm xda version (bugs: avatars in the conversation list are black and if you rapidly switch conversations it will crash)

string-array.name: v44
string-array.item: New: fixed weather bug\'s notification issue for both cm and layers
Play store: fixed uninstall dialog whiteness for cm
Framework: fixed bad devicedefault modifications for both cm and layers (example being the privacy guard alert dialog)
New: fixed pandora notification for cm and layers
New: fully themed relay for reddit for layers and cm xda (this only works with the dark based themes, so switch before you use it)

string-array.name: v43
string-array.item: Settings: fix glitch in account and about sections for layers
Play Store: removed some attributes available in only the latest version to add more compatibility
New: themed youtube for cm (xda only)
New: themed Pedometer (by Ivon) for layers
DocumentsUI: fixed white tinting for layers

string-array.name: v42
string-array.item: Settings: readded bitmap icons for full support
Settings: added icons for Chroma and Orion
Play Store: fixed crash for layers and updated cm version
New: themed soft reboot for cm
Google: moved back to cm play store build with small updates
Cm: changed lockscreen background to a different image
App: update all dependencies to latest versions

string-array.name: v41
string-array.item: Google +: fixed up tinting for cm and fixed community title color

string-array.name: v40
string-array.item: Moved google and google now launcher theme to xda build for cm

string-array.name: v39
string-array.item: Google+: update colors and ported to layers
Nova: fixed white background for cm
New: themed franco kernel updater (free) for cm
Snapchat: updated loading background and ported to layers

string-array.name: v38
string-array.item: Pushbullet: updated to material design and ported to layers

string-array.name: v37
string-array.item: Layers: fixed up heroimage (only for play store version)

string-array.name: v36
string-array.item: Settings: support AOSIP icon and custom colors
New: themed google play store for layers
New: themed nova launcher for layers
App: renamed layers and categorized them in the plugin (you might want to manually delete the duplicates since they have different names and won\'t be overwritten)

string-array.name: v35
string-array.item: Layers: fixed naming so zip installs properly
Layers: added complete ripples to pre lollipop
Layers: themed more core styles and drawables
Layers: moved nav bar icons to separate layers (uninstall if you have your own custom ones)

string-array.name: v34
string-array.item: App: removed dependency for balysv ripples
LAYERS SUPPORT - get the new layers manager and check it out!

string-array.name: v33
string-array.item: App: finally fixed donations, donating once will unlock a secret feature
App: FAB will not appear unless supported (you can always apply via the actual theme chooser)
App: cleaned up manifest, unnecessary colors, and other parts
Settings: fixed white fab (ie in blacklisting)

string-array.name: v32
string-array.item: Google Drive: moved to play store build

string-array.name: v30
string-array.item: Google Services: redo, sign in dialog text is now visible
Gmail: various fixes plus attempt to change white background for tablets

string-array.name: v29
string-array.item: Fixed crashes for play store version

Notice: from now on, I will only be pushing updates to the play store in increments of 0.x, rather than 0.0.x. All additional builds in between will be hosted on androidfilehost as xda versions. As much as I love to publicize my apps, it seems as though I am prone to errors with multiple build flavours and many more individual packages. Though I generally fix these issues within 24 hours, it still doesn\'t seem to be enough for this community. So in essence, I will be updating more frequently on xda, where responses are more constructive than damaging, and actually help bring this project forwards.

string-array.name: v28
string-array.item: Play store: redid appcompats, themed more icons

string-array.name: v27
string-array.item: Framework: revert actionbar theming for compatibility
Framework: themed zen icons for Euphoria\'s power menu
Theme: appcompat fixes all over the place
MMS: added bliss + cyanogenmod caf colors (did not test as I don\'t use bliss)
Kernel Adiutor: fixed fab + style redo
Swype: moved to main production (only material dark is themed)

string-array.name: v26
string-array.item: UI: added more credits + team blackout card (only visible if you haven\'t downloaded it yet)
UI: FAB directly goes to Material Glass in the theme chooser (thanks Ivon)
Nova Launcher: fixed white idle background
UI: Fixed ipples for icon section

string-array.name: v25
string-array.item: Google +: moved xda version to play store build

string-array.name: v24
string-array.item: UI: rebased to Paperboard v7 + lots of other fixes
Framework:: fixed dark overflow on light themes
Google Services: fixed some white backgrounds (xda)

string-array.name: v23

Settings: Fixed up battery chart section
Settings: Storage section colors now translucent

Gmail: Fixed up cache colors (now solid black)

DocumentsUI: Fully themed (based off of Euphoria)

SystemUI: Fixed battery circle base color

string-array.item: New: Themed relay for reddit (free and pro)

string-array.item: SystemMUI: Made quick settings slightly darker
UI: Borderless ripples in icon section
Dialer and Contacts: Fixed nav button issues

string-array.name: v18
string-array.item: Quick fix for theme error (sorry guys)

string-array.name: v17
string-array.item: Nova: Fixed icon picker crash (white on white though)

string-array.item: Framework: Reverted material light text colors
Removed Relay for reddit (reddit news) for now

string-array.name: v15

Check xda version for themed google +!

string-array.name: v10
string-array.item: Colored FAB for dialer and contacts

string-array.name: v8
string-array.item: Added ripples to a lot of areas

string-array.name: v7
string-array.item: Themed emergency dial and mobile networks, plus a bit more
Potential fix for dialog pop ups showing just the wallpaper
Added FAB in the app to launch the theme chooser (thanks Ivon)

string-array.name: v6
string-array.item: Removed dialer and contact theming (too buggy, use the xda version if you want it)

string-array.name: v5
string-array.item: Fixed issue with primary light text
Improved on gmail, more transparency and black dropdown
Downsized the bootanimation in hopes of supporting phones with hdpi and under (you can still get the xxhdpi version on android file host)

string-array.name: v2
string-array.item: Made google now drawer text a bit lighter

string-array.name: v0
string-array.item: January 15th, 2015: Theme Engine is merged into CyanogenMod 12.0
January 20th, 2015: Material Glass appears in the Play Store
